name: Aquatic Dojos
description:
Welcome! This is my entry for Mini Jam #84: Theme "Bubbles" and Limitation "You are your own ammo".

In Aquatic Dojos your deck is a school of fish. A school of martial arts, based around lauching themselves against the enemy!

Learn the art of the Narwhal and use it to defeat the horrible Bear dojo!

This project uses assets by Kenney Vleugels (at www.kenney.nl) under the Creative Commons Zero, CC0, License.
